item.title: Inox India Ltd - May 2025 Earnings Call Transcript Analysis
item.description:
Earnings Call Transcript Analysis Report #

INOX India Limited Q4 & FY ‘25 Earnings Call Analysis #

Financial Performance #

Key Financial Metrics (Q4 FY25): #

  • Revenue: INR 383 crores (up 33% YoY)
  • EBITDA: INR 95 crores (up 52% YoY)
  • PAT: INR 66 crores (up 55% YoY)

The total income for Q4 was INR383 crores, which grew by 33% Y-o-Y. The EBITDA was up by 52% stood at INR95 crores. Our quarterly PAT grew by 55% to INR66 crores.

item.title: Inox India Ltd:Annual Report 2023-24 Analysis
item.description:
Inox India Ltd: A Comprehensive Overview #

About the Company #

  • Year of Establishment and Founding History: Inox India Ltd. was established in 1992. It was founded as a part of the Inox Group, a well-known industrial conglomerate in India.

  • Headquarters Location and Global Presence: The company’s headquarters are located in Vadodara, Gujarat, India. Inox India has a global presence with operations and sales in various countries, including the United States, Europe, and several Asian countries.
